snippet: A Canadian group has documented the use of American-made Internet surveillance and censorship technology by more than a dozen governments, some with harsh human rights policies.
abstract: Citizen Lab Internet, Canadian human rights monitoring group, says it has documented the use of American-made Internet surveillance and censorship technology by more than dozen governments, some with harsh human rights policies.
lead_paragraph: A Canadian group has documented the use of American-made Internet surveillance and censorship technology by more than a dozen governments, some with harsh human rights policies.

headline.main: Rights Group Reports on Abuses of Surveillance and Censorship Technology
headline.print_headline: Rights Group Reports on Abuses of Surveillance and Censorship Technology
